brainly_data.question: Who is considered the father of modern anatomy
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: Who is considered the father of modern anatomy
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: Andreas Vesalius is considered to be the father of modern anatomy. Andreas was born in 1514 in Belgium to a family of physicians, where he would grow up to be an an anatomist and physicist, I hope this helps :)

top_answer.text: Andreas Vesalius is considered to be the father of modern anatomy. Andreas was born in 1514 in Belgium to a family of physicians, where he would grow up to be an an anatomist and physicist, I hope this helps :)
